import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter,Routes,Route,Link } from 'react-router-dom' import img1 from "./pictures/HP16D0195NF.jpg" import img2 from "./pictures/HP14424U3EA.jpg" import img3 from "./pictures/NXATHEF002.jpg" import img4 from "./pictures/HUA6901443442959.jpg"; export default function App() { const products = [ { id: 1, title: 'PC Portable Gamer HP VICTUS', price: '7490 DH', thumbnail : img1 }, { id: 2, title: 'PC Portable Gamer HP VICTUS', price: '2190 DH', thumbnail : img2 }, { id: 3, title: 'Pc Portable Chromebook Acer', price: '3640 DH', thumbnail: img3 }, { id: 4, title: 'PC Portable - HUAWEI', price: '1270 DH', thumbnail: img4 }]; return (

Ordinateurs portable

{products.map((elm,index)=>{ return

{elm.title}

{elm.price}

) }
